Spell Feedback.description: Any time a leydroth counteracts a spell or item, the spell's caster or the creature holding the item takes @Damage[8d6[mental]] damage (@Check[will|dc:38|basic] save).

Warded Ground.name: Warded Ground
Warded Ground.description: The guard designates a @Template[burst|distance:10]{10-foot radius} area within 30 feet as a protected zone. The guard's Strikes against targets in the protected zone deal an additional 2d6 precision damage.

Matron Uldrula.name: Matron Uldrula

Shard Shield.description:
Trigger A creature targets Matron Uldrula with an attack

Requirements Matron Uldrula has been reduced to 150 Hit Points or fewer

Effect The fragments of Matron Uldrula, sheared off from her form during this encounter, fly through the air, interposing themselves between Matron Uldrula and harm. Matron Uldrula gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.
Shard Shield.name: Shard Shield

Soul Shards.name: Soul Shards
Soul Shards.description: When Matron Uldrula is wounded, tiny fragments of her break away, littering the floor with glass-like shards. In their place, glimmering gold cracks crisscross Matron Uldrula's form, each hard as steel. When Matron Uldrula is reduced to 150 Hit Points or fewer, she gains resistance 10 to all physical damage, as her body becomes more gold than flesh.

Infuse Staff.name: Infuse Staff
Infuse Staff.description: Matron Uldrula's staff is her symbol of office and gains a measure of her personal power. This staff becomes a +2 greater striking staff and is treated as if it were adamantine while Matron Uldrula wields it. Matron Uldrula's staff has Hardness 17 and HP 68 (BT 34) while possessed by her, or Hardness 5 and HP 20 (BT 10) while out of her possession. If her staff is taken or destroyed, Matron Uldrula can infuse a new one with an hour of work.

Soul Lock.name: Soul Lock
Soul Lock.description:
Requirements Matron Uldrula doesn't have a soul locked within her staff

Effect Matron Uldrula attempts to capture the soul of a creature on the brink of death, either an undead creature or a creature with the dying condition. The target must attempt a @Check[will|dc:46] save with the following results.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected and becomes temporarily immune to Soul Lock.

Success Matron Uldrula's staff tugs at the creature's soul but doesn't trap it. If the creature is living, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} (or increases its doomed condition by 1). If the creature is a corporeal undead, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}. If the creature is an incorporeal undead, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2}. The creature then becomes temporarily immune to soul lock for 24 hours.

Failure Matron Uldrula locks the creature's soul in her staff. If the creature is living, it dies. If the creature is a corporeal undead, its body becomes an inanimate corpse. If the creature is an incorporeal undead, it becomes bodily trapped within the staff. While the soul is locked in the staff, the target can't be returned to life or undeath, or rejuvenated through any means, save powerful magic, such as miracle or wish, or through divine intervention. If Matron Uldrula's staff is destroyed or she wills it, the soul is released. Matron Uldrula's staff can only hold one soul at a time.

Spirit Touch.name: Spirit Touch
Spirit Touch.description: Matron Uldrula's Strikes affect incorporeal creatures with the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} property rune and deal @Damage[4d6[void]] damage to living creatures and @Damage[4d6[vitality]] damage to undead.

Matron Uldrula.publicNotes:
Shokis are shepherds who lead wayward souls to the Boneyard.

Psychopomps preside over death and the cycle of souls.

Bolster Dead.name: Bolster Dead
Bolster Dead.description:
Frequency once per turn

Requirements Your most recent action was to cast a non-cantrip necromancy spell

Effect You harness the residual energy from the spell you last cast into the body of an undead creature within 30 feet. That creature's resistances increase by an amount equal to the rank of the spell cast until the beginning of the next turn.

Drain Bonded Item.name: Drain Bonded Item
Drain Bonded Item.description:
Frequency once per day

Requirements The necromancer hasn't acted yet on this turn

Effect The necromancer expends the power stored in their dagger. This gives them the ability to cast one prepared spell they prepared today and already cast, without spending a spell slot.

Drowned Mummy.name: Drowned Mummy
Drowned Mummy.publicNotes: Rarely artificially created, drowned mummies are miserable, dripping undead that have adapted to exist in an aquatic environment, usually over centuries, after their tomb or lair becomes flooded.

Aquatic Echolocation (Precise) 120 feet.name: Aquatic Echolocation (Precise) 120 feet
Aquatic Echolocation (Precise) 120 feet.description: A drowned mummy can use its hearing as a precise sense at the listed range but only underwater.

Water Pressure.name: Water Pressure
Water Pressure.description: 30 feet. A creature that begins its turn within the aura feels overburdened by the weight of the water around it and must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:35] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.D5mg6Tc7Jzrj6ro7]{Encumbered} for as long as it remains in the area. A creature that succeeds is temporarily immune to water pressure for 24 hours. Water pressure only functions while the drowned mummy is underwater and can only affect creatures that are in contact with the same body of water.

Aquatic Advantage.name: Aquatic Advantage
Aquatic Advantage.description: A drowned mummy's Strikes deal an additional 2d6 damage against creatures in the same body of water as the drowned mummy.

Rancid Bloat.name: Rancid Bloat
Rancid Bloat.description:
This disease and damage from it can't be healed unless this curse is removed. A creature killed by rancid bloat rots away to waterlogged pieces of flesh and can't be resurrected except by an 8th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kqhPt9344UkcGVYO]{Resurrect} ritual or similar magic.

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:38]

Stage 1 carrier with no ill effect (1 minute)

Stage 2 @Damage[12d6[void]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} (1 day)

Stage 3 @Damage[16d6[void]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 4}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 4} (1 day)

Whirlpool.name: Whirlpool
Whirlpool.description:
Requirements The drowned mummy is underwater

Effect The drowned mummy commands the water to churn, creating a powerful whirlpool centered on itself. Each creature within a @Template[emanation|distance:30] centered on the drowned mummy takes @Damage[14d8[bludgeoning]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:38|basic]) as the powerful current batters them around. A creature that fails this save is pushed 20 feet away from the mummy and also falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} on a critical failure. The drowned mummy can't use Whirlpool again for [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Whirlpool]]{1d4 rounds}.

Shoki.name: Shoki
Shoki.allSaves: 对魔法的豁免+1状态加值

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: 对魔法的豁免+1状态加值 +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Infuse Staff.name: Infuse Staff
Infuse Staff.description: A shoki's staff becomes a +1 striking staff and is treated as if it were adamantine while the shoki wields it. A shoki's staff has Hardness 14 and HP 56 (BT 28) while possessed by the shoki or Hardness 5 and HP 20 (BT 10) while out of the shoki's possession. A shoki whose staff is taken or destroyed can infuse a new one with an hour of work.

Soul Lock.name: Soul Lock
Soul Lock.description:
Requirements The shoki doesn't have a soul locked within their staff

Effect The shoki attempts to capture the soul of a creature on the brink of death: either an undead creature, a creature with the dying condition, or a creature who died within the last minute. The target must attempt a @Check[will|dc:32] save with the following results.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected and becomes temporarily immune to Soul Lock.

Success The shoki's staff tugs at the creature's soul but doesn't trap it. If the creature is living, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} (or increases its doomed condition by 1). If the creature is a corporeal undead, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}. If the creature is an incorporeal undead, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2}. The creature then becomes temporarily immune to Soul Lock for 24 hours.

Failure The shoki captures the creature's soul in its staff. If the creature is living, it dies. If the creature is a corporeal undead, its body becomes an inanimate corpse. While the soul is locked in the staff, the target can't be returned to life or undeath, or rejuvenate through any means, save for powerful magic, such as miracle or wish. If the shoki's staff is destroyed or the shoki wills it, the soul is released. A shoki's staff can only hold one soul at a time.

Spirit Touch.name: Spirit Touch
Spirit Touch.description: A shoki's Strikes affect incorporeal creatures with the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} property rune and deal @Damage[2d6[void]] damage to living creatures and @Damage[2d6[vitality]] damage to undead.

Shoki.publicNotes:
Shokis are shepherds who lead wayward souls to the Boneyard.

Psychopomps preside over death and the cycle of souls.

Shadow Shift.name: Shadow Shift
Shadow Shift.description: Being made partially of shadow themselves, shae are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} in dim light or darkness even to creatures that can see clearly in those light levels.

Counterattack.name: Counterattack
Counterattack.description:
Trigger Ghiono is targeted by an attack from an adjacent creature that misses due to him being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}

Requirements Ghiono is aware of the attack

Effect Ghiono makes a Strike against the attacker.

Slip.name: Slip
Slip.description:
Trigger A creature moves adjacent to Ghiono

Effect Ghiono teleports to a clear space adjacent to another creature he can see within 30 feet.

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: Ghiono deals an additional 4d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

Tenebral Form.name: Tenebral Form
Tenebral Form.description: Ghiono can Fly at full Speed in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.V8wXOsoejQhe6CyG]{Vapor Form}.

Shabti Slayer.name: Shabti Slayer
Shabti Slayer.publicNotes:
Shabtis raised among the secret Pharasmin sect of the Carters Consortium are trained to destroy undead and the necromancers who create them.

Shabtis are facsimiles of the rich and powerful, patched together from shards of other souls and offered as a sacrifice to the Boneyard to suffer for the sins of their creator. Shabtis are unaware they aren't the person they emulate, and most spend an eternity enduring the punishments owed to another while the soul they emulate escapes judgement. Some shabtis discover their nature and often become adrift, drowning in the feelings and memories of their foul creator, with no true purpose and identities of their own.

Final Rest.name: Final Rest
Final Rest.description: A shabti slayer's Strikes affect incorporeal creatures with the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} property rune and deal @Damage[2d10[vitality]] damage to undead creatures.

Immortal.name: Immortal
Immortal.description: Shabtis don't age naturally and can't die of old age. Spells and effects that cause aging still affect a shabti as normal. They also can't be turned into undead.

Prayer-Blessed Blade.name: Prayer-Blessed Blade
Prayer-Blessed Blade.description:
Requirements The shabti slayer has successfully identified an undead with Recall Knowledge

Effect The shabti slayer prays to Pharasma to bless their weapon, enabling them to exploit the weaknesses of an undead they've identified with Recall Knowledge. If the identified undead has a resistance that can be bypassed by a special material or a weakness to a special material (such as cold iron, duskwood, or silver), weapons wielded by the shabti slayer count as that special material for 1 minute. If the creature has multiple materials that qualify, the shabti slayer chooses which material their weapon counts as for the duration.

Quick Draw.name: Quick Draw
Quick Draw.description: The shabti slayer draws a weapon using the Interact action, then Strikes with that weapon.

Two-Weapon Flurry.name: Two-Weapon Flurry
Two-Weapon Flurry.description:
Frequency once per round

需求 A shabti slayer is wielding two melee weapons, each in a different hand

效果 A slayer lashes out with both weapons. They Strike twice, once with each weapon.

Shield Warden.name: Shield Warden
Shield Warden.description: When a Firebrand bastion has a shield raised, they can use their Shield Block reaction when an attack is made against an adjacent ally. If they do, the shield prevents that ally from taking damage instead of preventing the bastion from taking damage, following the normal rules for Shield block.

Shoving Block.name: Shoving Block
Shoving Block.description:
触发 The Firebrand bastion uses the Shield Block reaction, and the opponent that triggered Shield Block is adjacent to the bastion and is the bastion's size or smaller

效果 The Firebrand bastion automatically Shoves the target of the Shield Block 10 feet. If this would cause the creature to hit an object, the creature takes @Damage[6[bludgeoning]] damage from the impact.

Blessed Armaments.name: Blessed Armaments
Blessed Armaments.description: Weapons and shields wielded by the Firebrand bastion affect incorporeal creatures with the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} property rune and deal an additional 3d6 vitality damage.

Quick Shield Block.name: Quick Shield Block
Quick Shield Block.description: At the start of each of a Firebrand bastion's turns, the bastion gains an additional reaction they can use only to Shield Block.

Battering Blow.name: Battering Blow
Battering Blow.description: The Firebrand bastion Strikes an adjacent creature, then @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shoves} the same creature.

Keen Eyes.name: Keen Eyes
Keen Eyes.description: Ruby gains a +2 circumstance bonus when using the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} action to find @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} creatures within 30 feet. When she targets an opponent that's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} or hidden, she reduces the DC of the flat check to @Check[flat|dc:3] for a concealed target or @Check[flat|dc:9] for a hidden one.

Daring Gambit.name: Daring Gambit
Daring Gambit.description: Ruby attempts to distract an enemy with a death-defying maneuver. She attempts an @Check[acrobatics|defense:reflex] check against the Reflex DC of one target within her melee reach. On a success, Ruby Strides up to 15 feet (or 30 feet on a critical success) without triggering reactions from her target due to her movement, and the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against Ruby's next melee Strike before the end of her turn. Regardless of the result of her Acrobatics check, Ruby attempts a melee Strike against the target.

Light Step.description: Ruby ignores difficult terrain when she Strides or Steps.
Light Step.name: Light Step

Mobile Combatant.name: Mobile Combatant
Mobile Combatant.description: Ruby's Strikes deal an additional 4d6 damage if she has moved at least 10 feet during her turn.

Timely Boast.name: Timely Boast
Timely Boast.description:
触发 A creature is critically hit by Ruby, or a creature critically misses Ruby

效果 Ruby taunts the triggering creature and boasts about her prowess. Ruby attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} the triggering creature.

Slow.name: Slow
Slow.description: 丧尸永久陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}且无法使用反应动作。

Bolster Dead.name: Bolster Dead
Bolster Dead.description:
Frequency once per turn

Requirements Your most recent action was to cast a non-cantrip necromancy spell

Effect You harness the residual energy from the spell you last cast into the body of an undead creature within 30 feet. That creature's resistances increase by an amount equal to the rank of the spell cast until the beginning of the next turn.

Drain Bonded Item.name: Drain Bonded Item
Drain Bonded Item.description:
Frequency once per day

需求 The necromancer hasn't acted yet on this turn

效果 The necromancer expends the power stored in their dagger. This gives them the ability to cast one prepared spell they prepared today and already cast, without spending a spell slot.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: When Vikroti is destroyed, her soul immediately transfers to her @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.NEbr7nKuiluJgBHT]{Soul Cage}. She can be permanently destroyed only if her soul cage is found and destroyed.

Counterspell.name: Counterspell
Counterspell.description:
触发 A creature casts a spell Vikroti has prepared

效果 Vikroti expends a prepared spell to counter the triggering creature's casting of that same spell. She loses her spell slot as if she'd cast the triggering spell. Vikroti then attempts to counteract the triggering spell.

Death's Chill.name: Death's Chill
Death's Chill.description: 15 feet. Vikroti is surrounded by an unnatural chill. Creatures that enter or begin their turn within the aura take @Damage[5d10[cold]] damage and are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} (@Check[fortitude|dc:37|basic]).

Drain Soul Cage.name: Drain Soul Cage
Drain Soul Cage.description:
Frequency once per day

效果 Vikroti taps into her @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.NEbr7nKuiluJgBHT]{Soul Cage's} power to cast any arcane spell up to the highest level she can cast, even if the spell being cast isn't one of her prepared spells. Her soul cage doesn't need to be present for her to use this ability.

Steady Spellcasting.name: Steady Spellcasting
Steady Spellcasting.description: If a reaction would disrupt Vikroti's spellcasting action, Vikroti attempts a @Check[flat|dc:15]. On a success, the action isn't disrupted.

Cold Beyond Cold.description: Vikroti's hand Strike deals cold damage, and the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 2}. A successful @Check[fortitude|dc:44] save reduces this to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} (or negates on a critical success).
Cold Beyond Cold.name: Cold Beyond Cold

Adopt Persona.name: Adopt Persona
Adopt Persona.description: Dead Faine attempts a Deception check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Impersonate}. He doesn't take a penalty to this check due to lacking a disguise kit, to appear as an undead, or to appear as a specific individual.

Feinting Strike.name: Feinting Strike
Feinting Strike.description:
Frequency once per round

需求 Dead Faine is within melee reach of an enemy

效果 Dead Faine Feints, then Strikes the target of his @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint}.

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: Dead Faine deals an additional 4d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures. This increases to 6d6 against creatures off-guard due to Dead Faine's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} or Traitorous Betrayal.

Give Them the Slip.name: Give Them the Slip
Give Them the Slip.description:
触发 Dead Faine gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{受擒 Grabbed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained} condition

效果 Dead Faine slips out of his disguise to escape; he removes the grabbed, immobilized, and restrained conditions imposed by the triggering event, then he Steps. If Dead Faine is currently Impersonating, his disguise is ruined, and he's exposed as himself.

Traitorous Betrayal.name: Traitorous Betrayal
Traitorous Betrayal.description: Dead Faine Interacts to draw his dagger and Strikes with it. If the target believes Dead Faine was anyone other than himself, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against Dead Faine's attack.

Battering Defense.name: Battering Defense
Battering Defense.description: The Bellator Mortus uses their shield as both a weapon and a defensive measure. Attempt a shield Strike. If the Strike hits, Raise a Shield.

Coordinated Assault.name: Coordinated Assault
Coordinated Assault.description: The Bellator Mortus acts as part of a well-trained unit. Their Strikes deal an additional 4d6 damage to creatures within reach of at least one of the Bellator Mortus's allies.

Vanth Warrior.name: Vanth Warrior
Vanth Warrior.allSaves: 对魔法的豁免+1状态加值

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic.name: 对魔法的豁免+1状态加值 +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Infuse Weapon.name: Infuse Weapon
Infuse Weapon.description: A vanth's scythe is their symbol of office and gains a measure of their personal power. This scythe becomes a +2 striking scythe and is treated as if it were adamantine while the vanth wields it. A vanth whose scythe is taken or destroyed can infuse a new one with an hour of work.

Reaping Scythe.name: Reaping Scythe
Reaping Scythe.description: The vanth throws their scythe, which flies in a @Template[line|distance:60], dealing @Damage[6d8[slashing]] damage to all creatures in the area (@Check[reflex|dc:34|basic]) and returns to the vanth's hand.

Spirit Touch.name: Spirit Touch
Spirit Touch.description: A vanth's Strikes affect incorporeal creatures with the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} property rune and deal @Damage[3d6[void]] damage to living creatures and @Damage[3d6[vitality]] damage to undead.

Vanth's Curse.name: Vanth's Curse
Vanth's Curse.description:
Frequency three times per day

效果 The vanth bestows a curse on a creature by touching it with their scythe. The creature must attempt a @Check[will|dc:34] save.

大成功 The target is unaffected and is temporarily immune to Vanth's Curse for 24 hours.

成功 The target feels a momentary shudder of doom and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} for 1 minute by the distracting sensation.

失败 The target becomes morose and glum as it accepts its own inevitable fate. For 1 hour, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 3}. Each time the target gains the dying condition, the stupefied value increases by 1, to a maximum value of stupefied 6.

大失败 As failure, but the effect is permanent.

Vanth Warrior.publicNotes: Protecting the Boneyard are the stern and resolute guardians of the dead known as vanths, psychopomps who resemble skeletons with raven-like wings and a mask resembling a vulture's skull. Vanths carry black scythes to fight against those who would disturb the natural progression of souls, and they consider any visitor to the Boneyard a potential troublemaker. When the psychopomp armies go to war, vanths serve as front-line soldiers. They rarely speak and even more rarely show any emotion other than a grim adherence to duty.

Aquatic Assault.name: Aquatic Assault
Aquatic Assault.description: Basiri Swims and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If both she and her opponent are submerged underwater, she can Strike one additional time.

Harness Wellspring.name: Harness Wellspring
Harness Wellspring.description: Basiri draws upon the necromantic wellspring to power her spellcasting. During her turn, she gains the ability to cast one of the following spells, heightened to 9th rank: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.PHVHBbdHeQRfjLmE]{Spirit Blast} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Ht35SDf9PDStJfoC]{Spirit Song}.

Wellspring Guardian.name: Wellspring Guardian
Wellspring Guardian.description: Once per day, Basiri can protect the necromantic wellspring by inscribing a magical sigil around the wellspring orrery. The first time a creature other than Basiri touches the orrery, that creature must succeed at a @Check[will|dc:41|traits:occult,spell,force,necromancy] save or be affected by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.PHVHBbdHeQRfjLmE]{Spirit Blast} (9th).

Bardic Lore.name: Bardic Lore
Bardic Lore.description: Sphinxes are naturally curious, and their love of puzzles and mysteries leads them to gather information on a broad range of topics. Sphinxes have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.uVXEZblPRuCyPRua]{Bardic Lore} bard feat, allowing them to Recall Knowledge on any topic.

Bolster Dead.name: Bolster Dead
Bolster Dead.description:
Frequency once per turn

Requirements Your most recent action was to cast a non-cantrip necromancy spell

Effect You harness the residual energy from the spell you last cast into the body of an undead creature within 30 feet. That creature's resistances increase by an amount equal to the rank of the spell cast until the beginning of the next turn.

Drain Bonded Item.name: Drain Bonded Item
Drain Bonded Item.description:
Frequency once per day

需求 The necromancer hasn't acted yet on this turn

效果 The necromancer expends the power stored in their dagger. This gives them the ability to cast one prepared spell they prepared today and already cast, without spending a spell slot.

Feed.name: Feed
Feed.description:
Requirements The vampiric creature's most recent action was a successful jaws Strike that dealt damage

Effect The vampiric creature drains blood from its victim, dealing minimum jaws damage and regaining @Damage[10[healing]] Hit Points.

Flamboyant Reposition.name: Flamboyant Reposition
Flamboyant Reposition.description: With a flourish, a celebrant shrouds themself in a puff of smoke, glitter, or colorful ribbons. If the celebrant is adjacent to an enemy, they attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} that adjacent enemy. The celebrant Steps or Strides; they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} during this movement.

Circling Assault.name: Circling Assault
Circling Assault.description: The corpsekiller circles around their target then attacks, throwing their foe off balance and puncturing its defenses. The corpsekiller Steps or Strides, then attempts a glaive Strike. On a hit or critical hit, the Strike ignores 10 of their target's resistances. Regardless of the result of the Strike, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} for 1 round.

Corpsekiller.name: Corpsekiller
Corpsekiller.description: A corpsekiller's Strikes affect incorporeal creatures as though etched with a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} property rune and deal an additional @Damage[2d8[slashing]] damage to undead creatures.

Flamboyant Reposition.name: Flamboyant Reposition
Flamboyant Reposition.description: With a flourish, a celebrant shrouds themself in a puff of smoke, glitter, or colorful ribbons. If the celebrant is adjacent to an enemy, they attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} that adjacent enemy. The celebrant Steps or Strides; they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} during this movement.

Iron Command.name: Iron Command
Iron Command.description:
Trigger An enemy within 15 feet damages Seldeg

Effect Seldeg puts an impertinent foe who dared harm him in their proper place. He commands the enemy to kneel in obedience. If they refuse, they must pay the price in pain and anguish. The triggering creature must choose one of the following options: the enemy kneels, dropping @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} as a free action, or the enemy refuses and takes @Damage[5d6[mental]] damage. In addition, Seldeg's Strikes against the triggering creature deal an additional 3 damage until the end of his next turn. Seldeg chooses whether the additional damage is spirit or void each time he uses this reaction.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description:
When a graveknight is destroyed, its armor rebuilds its body over the course of [[/gmr 1d10 #days]]{1d10 days}-or more quickly if the armor is worn by a living host. If the body is destroyed before then, the process restarts.

A graveknight can only be permanently destroyed by obliterating its armor (such as with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]{Disintegrate}), transporting it to the Forge of Creation, or throwing it into the heart of a volcano.

Sacrilegious Aura.name: Sacrilegious Aura
Sacrilegious Aura.description: 30 feet. When a creature in the aura uses a vitality spell or ability, the graveknight automatically attempts to counteract it, with a counteract modifier of [[/r 1d20+27 #Counteract]]{+27}.

Devastating Blast.name: Devastating Blast
Devastating Blast.description: Seldeg unleashes a @Template[cone|distance:30] of fire. Creatures in the area take @Damage[9d12[fire]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:35|basic]). Seldeg can use this ability once every [[/gmr 1d4 #Recharge Devastating Blast]]{1d4轮}.

Graveknight's Curse.name: Graveknight's Curse
Graveknight's Curse.description:
This curse affects anyone who wears a graveknight's armor for at least 1 hour.

豁免检定 @Check[will|dc:35] save

潜伏期 1 hour

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} and cannot remove the armor（1天）

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 2}, the creature's Speed is reduced by 10, and cannot remove the armor（1天）

阶段3 dies and transforms into the armor's graveknight.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.6rnB7nK6J6zF4vea]{Effect: Graveknight's Curse}

Phantom Steed.name: Phantom Steed
Phantom Steed.description:
HP 130; AC 39, Fort +28, Ref +25, Will +22

Seldeg summons a supernatural mount as per @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.WPKJOhEihhcIm2uQ]{Marvelous Mount} (8th level). Unlike phantom steed, the steed's AC and saving throw bonuses are all 4 levels lower than Seldeg's, and the steed has one-third of Seldeg's Hit Points (rounded down). If the steed is destroyed, Seldeg must wait 1 hour before using this ability again.

Ruinous Weapons.name: Ruinous Weapons
Ruinous Weapons.description: Any weapon or unarmed attack Seldeg uses gains the effects of the +1 greater striking and greater flaming runes.

Unyielding Block.name: Unyielding Block
Unyielding Block.description: At the start of each of Seldeg's turns, he gains two additional reactions he can use only to perform a Shield Block.

Weapon Master.name: Weapon Master
Weapon Master.description: The graveknight has access to the critical specialization effects of any weapons it wields.

Bolster Dead.name: Bolster Dead
Bolster Dead.description:
Frequency once per turn

Requirements Your most recent action was to cast a non-cantrip necromancy spell

Effect You harness the residual energy from the spell you last cast into the body of an undead creature within 30 feet. That creature's resistances increase by an amount equal to the rank of the spell cast until the beginning of the next turn.

Drain Bonded Item.name: Drain Bonded Item
Drain Bonded Item.description:
Frequency once per day

需求 The necromancer hasn't acted yet on this turn

效果 The necromancer expends the power stored in their dagger. This gives them the ability to cast one prepared spell they prepared today and already cast, without spending a spell slot.

Kemnebi.name: Kemnebi
Kemnebi.hp: fast healing 20, mental rebirth, void healing

Thoughtsense (Precise) 100 feet.name: Thoughtsense (Precise) 100 feet
Thoughtsense (Precise) 100 feet.description: Kemnebi senses all non-mindless creatures within 100 feet as a precise sense.

Enlightened Mind.name: Enlightened Mind
Enlightened Mind.description: Whenever Kemnebi is targeted by a mental effect, that effect's source or caster must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:5]. If this check fails, the mental effect doesn't affect Kemnebi.

Mental Rebirth.name: Mental Rebirth
Mental Rebirth.description:
Unlike most other undead, a vetalarana isn't destroyed when they reach 0 HP. Instead, their body is destroyed, crumbling to ash, and their mind is immediately transferred into a creature they rendered comatose through Drain Thoughts. This creature must be within 1 mile; if no such creature is in range, the vetalarana is destroyed. The creature becomes controlled by the vetalarana and loses the stupefied and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious} conditions. If the creature controlled by a vetalarana in this way is killed, the vetalarana's mind transfers to another creature within 1 mile who they rendered comatose through Drain Thoughts.

After [[/gmr 1d6 #days]]{1d6 days} of being controlled, the controlled creature dies, and its body transforms into that of the vetalarana who rendered it comatose.

Vetalarana Vulnerabilities.name: Vetalarana Vulnerabilities
Vetalarana Vulnerabilities.description:
All vetalaranas possess the following weaknesses.

  • Barred Senses A vetalarana can't see or sense through force effects or cold iron, and their mind can't penetrate force effects or cold iron. Such barriers can prevent the transference of a vetalarana's mind through Mental Rebirth.
  • Revulsion A vetalarana delights in consuming memories and secrets, and is disgusted by those who share such sensitive tidbits openly. A vetalarana can't voluntarily come within 10 feet of a creature loudly voicing their intimate personal secrets or most cherished memories aloud. Speaking such information aloud with conviction is a single action that has the auditory, concentrate, and linguistic traits, and protects the creature until the start of its next turn. A vetalarana that involuntarily comes within 10 feet of a creature sharing such information gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} condition until they're 10 feet or farther from the creature. After 1 round of being exposed to the secrets of a creature, a vetalarana can attempt a @Check[will|dc:25] save as a single action, which has the concentrate trait. On a success, they overcome their revulsions for [[/gmr 1d6 #rounds]]{1d6 rounds} (or 1 hour on a critical success).
  • Vulnerable to Brain Destruction A vetalarana whose brain has been destroyed, or is reduced to 0 HP while unable to take mental actions, can't use Mental Rebirth.

Center Self.name: Center Self
Center Self.description:
Frequency once per round

效果 Kemnebi regains 1 Focus Point. If he's stupefied, he reduces the value of his stupefied condition by one. If Kemnebi is affected by a mental effect or spell, Kemnebi attempts to counteract that effect or spell with a [[/r 1d20+33 #Counteract]]{+33} counteract modifier.

Control Comatose.name: Control Comatose
Control Comatose.description:
Frequency once per day

Effect The vetalarana manipulator spends 10 minutes to take psychic control of the creatures they've rendered comatose with Drain Thoughts. This has the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wU6hNzK8Yfqdmc8m]{Possession} spell, but lasts for up to 6 hours, has a range of 1 mile, and the vetalarana can control a number of comatose victims at a time equal to half the vetalarana's level. A comatose victim can't resist this possession and automatically gets a critical failure on its saving throw against Control Comatose.

As long as a comatose victim is controlled by a vetalarana manipulator in this way, the victim's stupefied and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} conditions are temporarily suppressed.

Deflect Attack.name: Deflect Attack
Deflect Attack.description:
需求 Kemnebi is aware of the attack, isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard} , and has a hand free

触发 Kemnebi is the target of a physical ranged attack or ranged spell attack

效果 Kemnebi gains a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the attack misses, Kemnebi has deflected it. He can't use this reaction to deflect unusually massive ranged projectiles (such as boulders or ballista bolts).

Drain Thoughts.name: Drain Thoughts
Drain Thoughts.description:
Requirements A @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, or willing creature is within Kemnebi's reach

Effect Kemnebi seizes a creature and consumes its memories. This requires an @Check[athletics|defense:fortitude] check against the victim's Fortitude DC if the victim is grabbed and is automatic for any of the other conditions. The victim is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} and Kemnebi regains @Damage[35[healing]] HP, gaining any excess HP as temporary Hit Points. Draining Thoughts from a creature that's already stupefied doesn't restore any HP to Kemnebi but increases the victim's stupefied value by 2. Additionally, Kemnebi views one of the victim's memories and can choose to alter, enhance, or erase the memory he views as 4th- level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.FhOaQDTSnsY7tiam]{Rewrite Memory}.

A victim's stupefied condition value decreases by 1 every week.

A victim who becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 5} in this way is rendered comatose, becoming permanently unconscious. As long as Kemnebi lives, a comatose victim can't regain consciousness, and its stupefied condition doesn't decrease.

Flurry of Blows.name: Flurry of Blows
Flurry of Blows.description:
Frequency once per round

效果 Kemnebi makes two claw Strikes. If both hit the same creature, combine their damage for the purposes of resistances and weaknesses. Kemnebi applies his multiple attack penalty to the Strikes normally.

Paralyzing Claws.name: Paralyzing Claws
Paralyzing Claws.description: Any living, non-mindless creature hit by Kemnebi's claw Strike must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:36] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}. It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each such save.

Shabti Votary.name: Shabti Votary
Shabti Votary.allSaves: +2 status to all saves vs. mental and possession

+2 Status to All Saves vs. Mental and Po.name: +2 Status to All Saves vs. Mental and Possession

Discerning Aura.name: Discerning Aura
Discerning Aura.description:
30 feet. All undead within the aura glow blue, shedding dim light in a 5-foot radius. Visible undead can't be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} while affected by this aura. Invisible undead are concealed while affected by this aura, rather than being undetected.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.mo4IRyv7GGRBJihU]{Effect: Discerning Aura}

Gird in Prayer.name: Gird in Prayer
Gird in Prayer.description:
触发 An ally within the shabti votary's aura is the target of a death, mental, or possession effect

效果 The shabti votary girds their ally in protective prayers. The triggering creature gains a +2 status bonus to saving throws against death, mental, and possession effects until the beginning of the shabti votary's next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.VLOvyQiZKeXppS2L]{Effect: Gird in Prayer}

Immortal.name: Immortal
Immortal.description: Shabtis don't age naturally and can't die of old age. Spells and effects that cause aging still affect a shabti as normal. They also can't be turned into undead.

Cremate Undead.name: Cremate Undead
Cremate Undead.description: A shabti votary's vitality energy sets undead alight. When a shabti votary uses a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} spell to damage undead, each undead that takes damage also takes persistent fire damage equal to the spell's rank.

Expand Aura.name: Expand Aura
Expand Aura.description:
Frequency once per turn

效果 The shabti votary focuses their will, expanding the area of their discerning aura by 20 feet for 1 minute. This expansion is cumulative with other uses of Expand Aura.

Shabti Votary.publicNotes:
Shabti votaries are devout clerics of Pharasma who heal and protect their allies while destroying enemies of their faith. Although shabti votaries focus primarily on destroying undead, they remain a potent enemy against living foes.

Shabtis are facsimiles of the rich and powerful, patched together from shards of other souls and offered as a sacrifice to the Boneyard to suffer for the sins of their creator. Shabtis are unaware they aren't the person they emulate, and most spend an eternity enduring the punishments owed to another while the soul they emulate escapes judgement. Some shabtis discover their nature and often become adrift, drowning in the feelings and memories of their foul creator, with no true purpose and identities of their own.

Circling Assault.name: Circling Assault
Circling Assault.description: The corpsekiller circles around their target then attacks, throwing their foe off balance and puncturing its defenses. The corpsekiller Steps or Strides, then attempts a glaive Strike. On a hit or critical hit, the Strike ignores 10 of their target's resistances. Regardless of the result of the Strike, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} for 1 round.

Corpsekiller.name: Corpsekiller
Corpsekiller.description: A corpsekiller's Strikes affect incorporeal creatures as though etched with a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} property rune and deal an additional @Damage[2d8[slashing]] damage to undead creatures.
